questions.name: Q1
questions.text: Do you drink on more than 2 days a week?

questions.name: Q3
questions.text: Do you exercise more than 1 hour per week?

en-gb.great_work: Thank you for answering our questions, we don't need to see you at this time. Keep up the good work!
en-gb.please_call: We think there are some simple things you could do to improve you quality of life, please phone to book an appointment.
